definition: very close/very near
8 in. length unit of Zhou dynasty
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]
to be almost within reach/to be close at hand
so close, yet worlds apart (idiom)

sentences.english: It smells like summer is right around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 那聞起來像是夏天近在咫尺了。

sentences.english: It is this love that knows no separation. To it, far is near.
sentences.chinese: 此愛不可分隔，視天涯如咫尺。

sentences.english: Chinese Export Commodities Fair Museum in close proximity, 12-storey.
sentences.chinese: 中國出口商品交易會館近在咫尺，樓高12層。

sentences.english: Do not you see right close the door closed Gillian long, life is frustrated no north and south.
sentences.chinese: 君不見咫尺長門閉阿嬌，人生失意無南北。

sentences.english: It is a high-class hotel within a stone's throw distance of Tivoli Park.
sentences.chinese: 與趣伏裏公園近在咫尺的高級飯店。

sentences.english: The eye Reamon fault will be can only see www. 218y. com the very close future.
sentences.chinese: 眼睛裏蒙著的斷層是隻能看到咫尺的未來。

sentences.english: A piece of the church- yard fit everybody.
sentences.chinese: 教堂咫尺地，可理任何人。

sentences.english: The bridge is still there but this time, it's the way to live.
sentences.chinese: 奈何橋近在咫尺，這次，它是通向生者的橋樑。

sentences.english: But we were divided; he was as inscrutable as my headmaster.
sentences.chinese: 可是我們卻咫尺天涯，他象我的校長一樣不可理解。

sentences.english: Icebound river, let the distance of the other shore look like very short distance.
sentences.chinese: 冰封的河，讓彼岸的距離近似咫尺。

sentences.english: The technology already exists, or is within easy reach, they wrote.
sentences.chinese: 他們寫道，這項技術已經存在，或者說近在咫尺了。

sentences.english: Far the step go to is clear it is thus clear that, very short distance happy but good limits of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 遠去的步伐清晰可見，咫尺的幸福卻好似天涯。

sentences.english: Kunming Green Lake Park is in the 8-minute distance on foot.
sentences.chinese: 昆明翠湖公園近在咫尺，步行八分鐘即可到達。

sentences.english: Heaven above weighs the scales; you need not seek far.
sentences.chinese: 殃樣果報無虛謬，咫尺青天莫遠求。

sentences.english: Metro Line 5 station and the community close the main entrance.
sentences.chinese: 地鐵五號線車站與社區正門近在咫尺。

sentences.english: If we have a day in the earth of the sides, the world is but a little place.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們有一天身處地球的兩側，咫尺天涯。
